description.content:
Retrieves data from all Content Types.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
(Required) Project ID specified in the settings of the CMS (alpha) app.
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

item.name: Get all CMS pages by content type

request.name: Get all CMS pages by content type

description.content:
Gets data from all pages of a given content type.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
Version ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.
Release ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.

Filter results by a property of the page (e.g., `filters[status]`) or by a nested custom field of the `parameters` object (e.g., `filters[parameters.collection.sort]`).
*Replace {field} with the desired property.*
(Required) Project ID specified in the settings of the CMS (alpha) app.
(Required) Content type identifier defined in the FastStore project.
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

Gets all data from a given page.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
Version ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.
Release ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.

(Required) Content type ID defined in the FastStore project.
(Required) Document ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

The [VTEX Headless CMS](https://www.faststore.dev/docs/headless-cms-overview) is a solution for storefront content management.
You can use the Headless CMS API to fetch data about your project's pages and content types, including `status`, `id`, and `type`. 

 ## Index 

 ### Pages 
- `GET` [Get all Content Types](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/headless-cms-api#get-/_v/cms/api/-projectId-)
- `GET` [Get all CMS pages by content type](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/headless-cms-api#get-/_v/cms/api/-projectId-/-content-type-)
- `GET` [Get CMS page](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/headless-cms-api#get-/_v/cms/api/-projectId-/-content-type-/-document-id-)

**Servers**
- `https://{accountName}.myvtex.com/`
- `https://{workspace}--{accountName}.myvtex.com/`

## Common parameters

| **Parameter name** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------------- |
| {{accountName}} | Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL. | Server variable. |
| {{workspace}} | Name of the VTEX workspace. | Server variable. |
| {{projectId}} | Project ID specified in the settings of the CMS (alpha) app. | Path variable. |
